attributes.action: Invest in more funding for the NHS to deal with mental health issues
attributes.additional_details: There have been many young people close to us who have committed suicide, attempted suicide and suffer from serious mental health issues on a daily basis. In our area we have to wait 6 months for an appointment with a councillor or therapist through the NHS. Someone with a physical illness wouldn’t have to wait 6 months so why should someone with mental illness have to wait 6 months. Too many young lives are being lost due to lack of funding and support, this needs to stop!
attributes.background: I have started this petition with the help of a few friends to raise awareness of the lack of support and help for people suffering from mental health issues.
